text:
I found a typo in filter.html. It says:

> will copy recursively all the files from the src.dir directory into 
> the dest.dir directory replacing all the occurences of the string   
> @year@ with 2000.                                                   

I believe "occurences" should be "occurrences".
creator: yyamano@kt.rim.or.jp

text:
aspell agrees with you 8-)

fixed in nightly build 2002-04-13, thanks!
creator: bodewig@apache.org
